name: Endocrinology Metabolic Screening Package
description: Comprehensive endocrine and metabolic screening protocols including 2024 diabetes guidelines and thyroid function assessment

screening_types.name: Diabetes Screening - A1C
screening_types.description: Hemoglobin A1C screening for diabetes in adults 45+ or high-risk individuals

screening_types.name: Diabetes Screening - High Risk
screening_types.description: A1C screening for high-risk individuals regardless of age

screening_types.name: Diabetes Monitoring - A1C
screening_types.description: Regular A1C monitoring for established diabetic patients

screening_types.name: Fasting Glucose
screening_types.description: Fasting plasma glucose for diabetes screening and monitoring

screening_types.name: Oral Glucose Tolerance Test
screening_types.description: 75g OGTT for diabetes diagnosis in unclear cases

screening_types.name: Thyroid Function - TSH
screening_types.description: Thyroid stimulating hormone screening for thyroid dysfunction

screening_types.name: Thyroid Function - Complete Panel
screening_types.description: Complete thyroid function testing (TSH, Free T4, Free T3)

screening_types.name: Thyroid Antibodies
screening_types.description: Thyroid peroxidase and thyroglobulin antibodies for autoimmune thyroid disease

screening_types.name: Lipid Panel - Metabolic
screening_types.description: Lipid screening for metabolic syndrome and cardiovascular risk

screening_types.name: Comprehensive Metabolic Panel
screening_types.description: Complete metabolic panel including glucose, electrolytes, kidney function

screening_types.name: Microalbumin
screening_types.description: Urine microalbumin for diabetic nephropathy screening

screening_types.name: Testosterone
screening_types.description: Testosterone screening for hypogonadism in symptomatic men

screening_types.name: PCOS Screening
screening_types.description: Hormonal assessment for polycystic ovary syndrome
